titleStmt.title: An heavenly wonder, or, A Christian cloath'd with Christ purposely penned to comfort Christs sin-sick-spouse / by Sam. Moore, minister of the gospel of God sometimes at Brides in Fleetstreete, London.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Samuel, b. 1617.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, cropped and torn, with print show-through and loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
